title: In Case You ﻿Needed Another Reason to Shop, Sephora’s Cyber Week Sale Is Here
description: Major deals on Youth to the People, Fenty Beauty, Lancme, and more.
excerpt: Topicals, Nars, and Dyson are all included.
text: You know that hydrating serum you’ve been tilting and scraping to get every last drop? Is your hair severely damaged and in need of reprieve? Have you cleaned your makeup brushes? No judgement here, but we’re here to let you in on a little secret to help: Sephora is having another massive sale. This time, the sale is for Black Friday and Cyber Monday, which means it’s the perfect time to restock on holy grail formulas or introduce some new ones into your lineup. Starting on November 25, the Sephora Cyber Week sale event will last until Cyber Monday, which falls on December 2. Unlike the annual Savings Event, which doles out promotions based on membership tiers, this year’s Black Friday and Cyber Monday sale is open to all shoppers, offering 30 percent off a curated selection of beauty brands each day. Featured daily brand deals include Make Up For Ever (November 27), Pat McGrath and Sunday Riley (November 28), Fenty Beauty (November 29), Kiehl’s (November 30), and Youth to the People and Peter Thomas Roth (December 2). The best part of it all is that even when daily brand-specific sales end, there’s still a plethora of top-tier products from beloved brands to shop, many of which are up to 50 percent off. This is where ELLE Beauty comes in. As a beauty editor working tentpole sales like Sephora’s yearly events for years, I’ve swatched, slathered, spritzed thousands of formulas. If I can find the best sunscreen for acne-prone skin, the coziest winter perfumes, and effacaious skin care sets worth every penny, there’s no telling what I can find in the depths of Sephora’s sale pages. In fact, that’s exactly what I spent hours doing. After scrolling through the Sephora Cyber Week sale, we put together a thoughtfully curated set of items ELLE Beauty will be repurchasing along with underrated gems from brands we believe are deserving of your hard-earned coin.SKIN CARE A proper winter skin care routine prioritizes repair and hydration above all else. Of course, sunscreen is a year-round requirement, which makes gift sets from Kiehl’s and Paula’s Choice a worthy addition to your shopping cart. Both kits provide enough products to cover your AM and PM routines, with treatment toners and serums, nourishing moisturizers, and high-SPF coverage. Other sale standouts include the viral Topical’s lip balm, Glow Recipe’s peptide-rich Pomegranate, and a head-to-toe glow duo from Youth to the People. Glow recipe Pomegranate Peptide Firming SerumNow 20% OffKiehl's Since 1851 Keeping Up With Kiehl's Holiday VaultNow 25% OffSK-II Brightening PITERA Ultimate Aura Essentials KitNow 20% OffPaula's Choice 7 Days of Glow Advent CalendarNow 11% OffYouth To The People Dream a la Glow - Full Body Hydration DuoNow 25% OffTopicals Slick Salve Glossy Lip Balm Duo for Dry LipsNow 31% OffEstée Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Bright Soft Creme MoisturizerNow 40% OffMAKEUPNothing screams holiday cheer quite like a fresh assortment of makeup to play with ahead of any holiday soirees. Nestled in the makeup pages of Sephora’s Cyber Week sale are everything from viral faves to time-honored staples from heritage brands. Make Up For Ever’s blush and highlighter palette offers a slew of colors to mix and match, regardless of complexion. Speaking of complexion, now’s the time to try Nars’ cult-favorite foundation, which leaves a subtle, dewy finish, or Sephora Collection’s much slept-on but impressive Best Skin Ever concealer. Nars Natural Radiant Full Coverage Longwear FoundationNow 28% OffLancôme Lash Idôle Lengthening & Volumizing MascaraNow 30% OffMake Up For Ever Skin Blush & Glow Longwear Palette Now 30% OffMilk Makeup Hydro Grip Hydrating PrimerNow 35% OffRefy Lip Sculpt Lip Liner and Setter Now 20% OffSephora Collection Concealer Now 50% OffYves Saint Laurent The Bold High Pigment Lipstick Now 50% OffHAIR CAREEvery year, Dyson’s Airwrap Multistyler soars to the top of wishlists. During this sale, the viral hair tool, which is dipped in a gorgeous pinkish, bronze hue, gets $100 shaved off its retail price. If you’re looking for a tool to help you switch between beach waves and bombshell curls, T3’s Twirl Trio offers three different barrel sizes for a variety of hair types. Of course, with all this hot-styling, you can’t neglect treating your actual strands. Use Dae’s three-pronged hair care system to restore balance to weakened strands, or boost your hair’s density with The Rootist’s hair-thickening serum.Dyson Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete Long in Strawberry Bronze Now 17% OffThe Rootist Densifying & Thickening SerumNow 30% OffSienna Naturals Hydrating H.A.P.I. Shampoo Now 20% OffDae Tressed to Chill Hair Essentials Trio Value SetNow 30% OffT3 Twirl Trio Interchangeable Curling Iron Set Now 30% OffFRAGRANCE Whether you have an upcoming vacation planned, need to restock on a signature scent, or simply want a new aroma to blanket your home, Sephora’s sale is chock-full of fragrant goods. Tom Ford’s classic Shimmering Body Oil is a tropical vacation in a bottle, packed with glitter flecks that add a radiant, sunkissed finish. Elsewhere on the page, you can find a citrusy candle by Nest or delve deeper into the world of Mugler with the Alien Goddess eau de parfum.Tom Ford Mini Soleil Body Oil SetNow 20% OffMugler Alien Goddess Eau de ParfumNow 40% OffGlossier You Eau de Parfum SetNow 15% OffNest Fragrances Lime Zest & Matcha CandleNow 25% OffLancôme La Vie Est Belle FragranceNow 30% OffNerisha Penrose is the Beauty Commerce Editor at ELLE.com. Prior to joining the team, she was an Editorial Fellow at ELLE.com. In her current role, she helps lead coverage on makeup, skin care, hair, and fragrances. With over six years of experience in the world of beauty editorial, Nerisha enjoys delving deep into the complexities of fragrance notes, hunting for the best fixes for acne-prone skin, and advocating for daily sunscreen use. She regularly researches and tests the latest products, consults beauty professionals (including our Beauty Advisory Board) to determine the best expert-approved formulas to recommend, and conducts interviews with luminaries across the industry. Nerisha received her bachelor’s degree in Communication and Media Studies from Temple University before joining the editorial teams at Nylon and Billboard. In 2020, she co-launched our popular franchise The State of Black Beauty, an ongoing exploration of—and destination for—beauty at the intersection of Black culture.
html:
You know that hydrating serum you’ve been tilting and scraping to get every last drop? Is your hair severely damaged and in need of reprieve? Have you cleaned your makeup brushes? No judgement here, but we’re here to let you in on a little secret to help: Sephora is having another massive sale. This time, the sale is for Black Friday and Cyber Monday, which means it’s the perfect time to restock on holy grail formulas or introduce some new ones into your lineup.

Starting on November 25, the Sephora Cyber Week sale event will last until Cyber Monday, which falls on December 2. Unlike the annual Savings Event, which doles out promotions based on membership tiers, this year’s Black Friday and Cyber Monday sale is open to all shoppers, offering 30 percent off a curated selection of beauty brands each day. Featured daily brand deals include Make Up For Ever (November 27), Pat McGrath and Sunday Riley (November 28), Fenty Beauty (November 29), Kiehl’s (November 30), and Youth to the People and Peter Thomas Roth (December 2).

The best part of it all is that even when daily brand-specific sales end, there’s still a plethora of top-tier products from beloved brands to shop, many of which are up to 50 percent off. This is where ELLE Beauty comes in.

As a beauty editor working tentpole sales like Sephora’s yearly events for years, I’ve swatched, slathered, spritzed thousands of formulas. If I can find the best sunscreen for acne-prone skin, the coziest winter perfumes, and effacaious skin care sets worth every penny, there’s no telling what I can find in the depths of Sephora’s sale pages. In fact, that’s exactly what I spent hours doing. After scrolling through the Sephora Cyber Week sale, we put together a thoughtfully curated set of items ELLE Beauty will be repurchasing along with underrated gems from brands we believe are deserving of your hard-earned coin.

SKIN CARE

A proper winter skin care routine prioritizes repair and hydration above all else. Of course, sunscreen is a year-round requirement, which makes gift sets from Kiehl’s and Paula’s Choice a worthy addition to your shopping cart. Both kits provide enough products to cover your AM and PM routines, with treatment toners and serums, nourishing moisturizers, and high-SPF coverage. Other sale standouts include the viral Topical’s lip balm, Glow Recipe’s peptide-rich Pomegranate, and a head-to-toe glow duo from Youth to the People.

Glow recipe Pomegranate Peptide Firming Serum

Now 20% Off

Kiehl's Since 1851 Keeping Up With Kiehl's Holiday Vault

Now 25% Off

SK-II Brightening PITERA Ultimate Aura Essentials Kit

Now 20% Off

Paula's Choice 7 Days of Glow Advent Calendar

Now 11% Off

Youth To The People Dream a la Glow - Full Body Hydration Duo

Now 25% Off

Topicals Slick Salve Glossy Lip Balm Duo for Dry Lips

Now 31% Off

Estée Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Bright Soft Creme Moisturizer

Now 40% Off

MAKEUP

Nothing screams holiday cheer quite like a fresh assortment of makeup to play with ahead of any holiday soirees. Nestled in the makeup pages of Sephora’s Cyber Week sale are everything from viral faves to time-honored staples from heritage brands. Make Up For Ever’s blush and highlighter palette offers a slew of colors to mix and match, regardless of complexion. Speaking of complexion, now’s the time to try Nars’ cult-favorite foundation, which leaves a subtle, dewy finish, or Sephora Collection’s much slept-on but impressive Best Skin Ever concealer.

Nars Natural Radiant Full Coverage Longwear Foundation

Now 28% Off

Lancôme Lash Idôle Lengthening & Volumizing Mascara

Now 30% Off

Make Up For Ever Skin Blush & Glow Longwear Palette

Now 30% Off

Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Hydrating Primer

Now 35% Off

Refy Lip Sculpt Lip Liner and Setter

Now 20% Off

Sephora Collection Concealer

Now 50% Off

Yves Saint Laurent The Bold High Pigment Lipstick

Now 50% Off

HAIR CARE

Every year, Dyson’s Airwrap Multistyler soars to the top of wishlists. During this sale, the viral hair tool, which is dipped in a gorgeous pinkish, bronze hue, gets $100 shaved off its retail price. If you’re looking for a tool to help you switch between beach waves and bombshell curls, T3’s Twirl Trio offers three different barrel sizes for a variety of hair types. Of course, with all this hot-styling, you can’t neglect treating your actual strands. Use Dae’s three-pronged hair care system to restore balance to weakened strands, or boost your hair’s density with The Rootist’s hair-thickening serum.

Dyson Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete Long in Strawberry Bronze

Now 17% Off

The Rootist Densifying & Thickening Serum

Now 30% Off

Sienna Naturals Hydrating H.A.P.I. Shampoo

Now 20% Off

Dae Tressed to Chill Hair Essentials Trio Value Set

Now 30% Off

T3 Twirl Trio Interchangeable Curling Iron Set

Now 30% Off

FRAGRANCE

Whether you have an upcoming vacation planned, need to restock on a signature scent, or simply want a new aroma to blanket your home, Sephora’s sale is chock-full of fragrant goods. Tom Ford’s classic Shimmering Body Oil is a tropical vacation in a bottle, packed with glitter flecks that add a radiant, sunkissed finish. Elsewhere on the page, you can find a citrusy candle by Nest or delve deeper into the world of Mugler with the Alien Goddess eau de parfum.

Tom Ford Mini Soleil Body Oil Set

Now 20% Off

Mugler Alien Goddess Eau de Parfum

Now 40% Off

Glossier You Eau de Parfum Set

Now 15% Off

Nest Fragrances Lime Zest & Matcha Candle

Now 25% Off

Lancôme La Vie Est Belle Fragrance

Now 30% Off

Nerisha Penrose is the Beauty Commerce Editor at ELLE.com. Prior to joining the team, she was an Editorial Fellow at ELLE.com. In her current role, she helps lead coverage on makeup, skin care, hair, and fragrances. With over six years of experience in the world of beauty editorial, Nerisha enjoys delving deep into the complexities of fragrance notes, hunting for the best fixes for acne-prone skin, and advocating for daily sunscreen use. She regularly researches and tests the latest products, consults beauty professionals (including our Beauty Advisory Board) to determine the best expert-approved formulas to recommend, and conducts interviews with luminaries across the industry. Nerisha received her bachelor’s degree in Communication and Media Studies from Temple University before joining the editorial teams at Nylon and Billboard. In 2020, she co-launched our popular franchise The State of Black Beauty, an ongoing exploration of—and destination for—beauty at the intersection of Black culture.
